component.name: customItem
component.script:
sub Init() m.Poster = m.top.findNode("poster") m.Title = m.top.findNode("title") m.Duration = m.top.findNode("duration") m.Date = m.top.findNode("date") m.Locked = m.top.findNode("lockedcontent") m.Poster.observeField("loadStatus", "onLoadStatusChanged") m.Shadow = m.top.findNode("shadow") end sub
sub itemContentChanged() updateLayout() m.Poster.uri = m.top.itemContent.HDPOSTERURL m.Title.text = m.top.itemContent.TITLE m.Duration.text = GetDurationStringStandard(m.top.itemContent.LENGTH) m.Date.text = m.top.itemContent.RELEASEDATE
limited = m.top.itemContent.TEXTOVERLAYBODY 'print limited
if(limited = "limited") m.Locked.visible = false 'true else m.Locked.visible = false end if end sub
sub onLoadStatusChanged() if m.Poster.loadStatus = "failed" m.Poster.uri = "pkg:/images/channel-poster_sd.png" end if end sub
Function GetDurationStringStandard( TotalSeconds = 0 As Integer ) As String datetime = CreateObject( "roDateTime" ) datetime.FromSeconds( TotalSeconds )
hours = datetime.GetHours().ToStr() minutes = datetime.GetMinutes().ToStr() seconds = datetime.GetSeconds().ToStr()
If Len( hours ) = 1 Then hours = "0" + hours End If If Len( minutes ) = 1 Then minutes = "0" + minutes End If If Len( seconds ) = 1 Then seconds = "0" + seconds End If
If hours <> "00" Then Return hours + ":" + minutes + ":" + seconds Else Return minutes + ":" + seconds End If End Function
sub updateLayout() if m.top.height > 0 And m.top.width > 0 then m.Poster.width = m.top.width m.Poster.height = m.top.height
smallTitleFont = CreateObject("roSGNode", "Font") smallTitleFont.uri = "pkg:/fonts/HelveticaNeueLTStd-Md.otf" smallTitleFont.size = 24
largeTitleFont = CreateObject("roSGNode", "Font") largeTitleFont.uri = "pkg:/fonts/HelveticaNeueLTStd-Roman.otf" largeTitleFont.size = 54
if(m.top.height < 400) 'm.Poster.height = "256" 'm.Poster.width="456" m.Title.translation = "[10,258]" m.Title.color = "#000000" m.Title.width = "430" m.Title.height = "0" m.Title.font = smallTitleFont m.title.vertAlign = "top" m.title.maxLines="2" m.Duration.translation = "[15, 0]" m.Date.visible = true m.Date.translation = "[12, 0]" ` m.Date.vertAlign = "top" m.Locked.translation = "[393, 184]" m.Shadow.uri = "pkg:/images/nd-roku-row-shadow.png" m.Shadow.width = m.Poster.width m.Shadow.height = m.Poster.height end if
m.Duration.width = m.Poster.width m.Duration.height = m.Poster.height m.Duration.vertAlign = "bottom"
if(m.top.height > 400) ' m.Poster.height = "512" 'm.Poster.width = "922" m.Title.color="#ffffff" m.Title.translation = [10, 0] m.Title.vertAlign = "bottom" m.Title.font= largeTitleFont m.Title.width = m.top.width - 500 m.Title.maxLines="3" m.Title.height = (m.top.height - 25) m.Date.visible = false m.Duration.translation = [15, 0] m.Locked.translation = "[955, 395]" m.Shadow.uri = "pkg:/images/nd-roku-main-shadow.png" m.Shadow.width = m.Poster.width m.Shadow.height = m.Poster.height end if end if end sub
